For a Limited Time: Enjoy 30% Off  Shop Now  Details
20251226-us-winter-sale-disclaimer
This offer is valid in the US only from 3:15 a.m. PT on December 26, 2025, to 11:59 p.m. PT on January 2, 2026, and is valid on select sale styles, as marked, at RalphLauren.com, on The Ralph Lauren App, and in full-price Ralph Lauren retail stores. This offer is not valid at Polo Ralph Lauren Factory Stores. This offer is not valid on Collection merchandise, Double RL merchandise, eyewear, fragrance, gift cards, limited-edition collections, new arrivals, philanthropic merchandise, previously purchased merchandise, Purple Label merchandise, Ralph Lauren luxury accessories and footwear, select customizable merchandise, select home merchandise, or watches and fine jewelry. This offer has no cash value. This offer can only be combined with applicable offers for free shipping. This offer is not applicable to purchases being shipped internationally. For Customer Assistance, please call 888-475-7674.
Free Shipping & Returns With an RL Account:
 Sign In or Create Now  Details
20230802-free-shipping-with-account-details
Enjoy free shipping on orders made using a RalphLauren.com account. Enjoy free returns within 30 days of the order ship date. See our returns policy for details and exclusions. The free shipping offer is automatically applied at checkout after signing in to your account at RalphLauren.com or on The Ralph Lauren App. Orders typically arrive within five business days if placed by 3 PM ET (11 AM ET for orders containing customized items). Your estimated delivery date will be provided at checkout. Orders containing fragrances, rugs, or lighting and orders greater than 30 units are not eligible for Fast shipping. Regular charges will apply to all other shipping methods. Any philanthropic donations added at checkout do not count toward the minimum purchase amount. This offer has no cash value. This offer is not applicable to purchases being shipped internationally. Ralph Lauren reserves the right to end or modify any free shipping offers at any time.

20201125-black-friday-see-details
This offer is valid from November 25, 2020, at 3:15 a.m. PT to November 27, 2020, at 11:59 p.m. PT on select full-price and sale styles, as marked, at RalphLauren.com only. This offer is automatically applied at checkout. The threshold and savings apply to qualifying merchandise only; amounts paid for excluded items, shipping and handling, or taxes do not count toward the threshold amount. This offer is not valid on previously purchased merchandise, new arrivals, Collection merchandise, Double RL merchandise, Purple Label merchandise, Ralph Lauren luxury accessories and footwear, face masks, select customizable merchandise, Ralphs Coffee product and merchandise, select home merchandise, limited-edition collections, philanthropic merchandise, books, watches and fine jewelry, fragrance, eyewear, or gift cards. This offer has no cash value. This offer can only be combined with applicable offers for free shipping. For Customer Assistance, please call 888-475-7674.
